INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter valid email. It must contain '@' followed by '.'!!
INVALID_PASSWORD: Please enter valid password. It must contain a special character!!
DUBLICATE_EMAIL_OR_PHONENO: Please enter unique email and phone_no. It already exist!!
INVALID_PHONE_NO: Please enter phone_no. It must be a number!!
SOMETHING_WENT_WRONG: Something went wrong. Internal server error!!
INVALID_LOGIN_CREDENTIALS: Email or phone_no and password is requried for login!!
INVALID_AUTHENTICATOR: Invalid authenticator. No such user exist!!
STRING_VALUES: Fields should be in the format of string!!
NUMBER_VALIES: Fields should be in the format of number!!
TOKEN_EXPIRED: Authentication token is expire. Please login again!!
USER_UNVERIFIED: Your account is being banned due to security reasons!!
INVALID_TIME: Invalid time. It should be in between 0 and 24 hrs!!
INVALID_CLOSE_TIME: Invalid close_time. It should be greater then open_time!!
INVALID_PROFILE_IMAGE_SIZE: Size of profile image should be less than 1MB!!
INVALID_PROFILE_IMAGE_TYPE: Type of profile image should PNG, JPG or JPEG!!
NO_CLASSROOM_EXIST: Invalid join_code. No such classroom exist!!
INVALID_CLASSROOM: Invalid classroom. No such classroom exist!!
INVALID_ROLE_ELIGIBLE: Your are not eligible to perform this task with your current role!!
INVALID_DELETE_ATTACHMENTS_TYPE: delete_attachments should be an array in the format of string!!
INVALID_DELETE_ATTACHMENTS: Invalid delete_attachments no such attachment exist!!
